import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/auth"; import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Main() { const [auth , setAuth] = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () =>{ setAuth({ token : "", refreshToken : null , user: null }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); navigate } return (
